main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by several persons in La Habra, California on 14 July 1955.
interesting points: The object was first sighted by two people driving in the area around 9:30 PM., The object appeared to be hovering for about two minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing., The observers estimated the object was air brown colored and the size of a dime at arm's length., Several other people in the area also reported the sighting., Detailed information about the sighting was forwarded to Air Force Intelligence.
witness description: Two people driving in the area
